TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTypeMapping extends System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping

Docs.summary: 包含从一种类型到另一种类型的映射。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>类用于编码的 SOAP XML 对象序列化为。 生成的 XML 符合万维网联合会 (www.w3.org) 文档"简单对象访问协议 (SOAP) 1.1"的第 5 节。 创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>通过调用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>方法的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>类。 使用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>若要构造的实例<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>类。 若要控制的序列化，使用之一中列出的特性[属性 That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。
## Examples 下面的示例将名为的类的实例序列化为`Transportation`，其中包含一个名为字段`Vehicle`。 一个<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>应用于字段。 当序列化字段时，XML 元素名称是"辅助"而不是"Vehicle"。 `SerializeOverride`方法创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>，并设置<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes.SoapElement%2A>的属性<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>。 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributes>添加到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeOverrides>用于创建<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>。 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用构造<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>，和的实例`Transportation`再次序列化类。 因为<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>是用于重写序列化，生成的 XML 元素名称现在是"Truck"而不是"辅助"。
[!code-cpp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CPP/soapelementoverrides.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CS/soapelementoverrides.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/VB/soapelementoverrides.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElementName As String
public: property System::String ^ ElementName { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property Namespace As String
public: property System::String ^ Namespace { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property TypeFullName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeFullName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 包含命名空间和类型的完全限定类型名。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 获取所映射对象的类型名。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类型名称是所映射对象的类名。
此外可以通过检查来查看完全限定的名称<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping.TypeFullName%2A>属性。
## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XsdTypeName As String
public: property System::String ^ XsdTypeName { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 获取所映射对象的 XML 元素名称。
Docs.value: 所映射对象的 XML 元素名称。 默认值为对象的类名称。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要设置对象的替代元素名称，将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>的类，并设置到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.TypeName%2A>属性的新值。
## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XsdTypeNamespace As String
public: property System::String ^ XsdTypeNamespace { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: 获取所映射对象的 XML 命名空间。
Docs.value: 所映射对象的 XML 命名空间。 默认值为空字符串("")。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 若要设置对象的命名空间名称，将应用<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute>的类，并设置到<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapTypeAttribute.Namespace%2A>属性的新值。
## Examples [!code-cpp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CPP/mapping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/CS/mapping.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlTypeMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlTypeMapping Example/VB/mapping.vb#1)]
